Text: ELECTRIC POWER Early Registration Deadline is Herepst In a couple of days February to be exact the registration fee for the ELECTRIC POWER Conference March in St Louis increases from to an savings if you register now Dont pay more to take advantage of the most comprehensive conference of the year speakerspanelists to address the concerns of operating management from operating companies Youve seen the advertising and the promotional material and if you have not yet decided to attend you may wish to view the latest on our web site The links below will take you to the section of the program of most interest to you You have access to all of these strategic tracks and tactical meetings with your registration fee STRATEGIC TRACKS Risky Business The st Century Energy Company more relevant today then ever Generating Asset Portfolio Management Your key to a healthy bottom line Environmental Issues Strategies How to stay in compliance and anticipate new curves New Technologies in Plant Concepts What will your next power plants look like Stealth Capacity Leveraging your Assets How to make your OM practices pay Moving Power to Market Transmission Interface Issues Its no use if you cant get your product to market TACTICAL MEETINGS PRB Coal Users Group Annual Meeting A must if you have western coal in your present or future Bituminous Coal Users Group Meeting Get in on the ground floor of this new industry group HRSG Users Group Annual Meeting th annual meeting where HRSG operators discuss it all candidly and without reserve Natural Gas Infrastructure Forum Just how secure is the price and delivery of this increasingly important fuel Nuclear Renaissance Forum Is the technology that our industry once claimed would produce power too cheap to meter back Alternative Power Forum DG wind solar storage to what extent will they be a part of our future eProCom What is the future of integrating eCommerce into your activities and what will be the impact EPC Solutions Boom or Bust a strong EPC industry is needed for our future In addition there are hardhitting interactive plenary sessions and two preconference workshops Plant Managers Roundtable Gas Turbine OM Council Workshop as well as a Technical Tour to Labadie Power Station Meet with your peers and get updated on the impact of the latest industry trends and developments while obtaining valuable information to make you more valuable to your company and your company more efficient in our everchanging industry IMAGE The ELECTRIC POWER Guarantee provides you with a full registration refund if the conference for any reason does not meet your expectation For additional details please call or go to our secure registration site by clicking below If you have more than five colleagues from your company attending discounted group plans will provide even greater savings Click Here to Register Now The Trade Fair Group If you would prefer not to receive further messages from this sender Click on the Reply button Replace the Subject field with the word REMOVE Click the Send button You will receive one additional email message confirming your removal
